医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
缺锌会增加肺部感染的风险饮食中缺锌会促进鲍曼不动杆菌引起的肺部感染；根据 11 月 15 日发表在《自然微生物学》杂志上的一项新研究，这是呼吸机相关性肺炎的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=632deafe-ba1a-41f6-80ab-a60b45f36748 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:36:45 -0500 Zinc deficiency linked to increased risk of lung infection
光脉冲有望控制癫痫发作加州大学旧金山分校、加州大学圣克鲁斯分校和加州大学伯克利分校的研究人员利用光脉冲来预防神经元中的癫痫样活动，这有一天可能成为一种新的癫痫治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7e3f081-c8d0-42a6-a0d0-8dd0ed201989 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:02:52 -0500 Pulses of light show promise in controlling seizures
怀孕期间的抗癫痫药物与儿童神经发育风险有关德雷克塞尔多恩西夫公共卫生学院研究人员的最新数据显示，在怀孕期间服用抗癫痫药物来控制癫痫发作和精神疾病的母亲所生的孩子可能会面临更大的神经发育疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac8597bd-9168-43e5-b5d0-a76d2c68c3dc Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:20:14 -0500 Antiseizure medications during pregnancy linked to neurodevelopmental risks in children
研究人员发现突变如何破坏蛋白质剪接并导致疾病一个国际研究小组发现了一种对细胞蛋白质生产至关重要的新机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6612cf0a-7c94-4e08-88fc-55edd5013193 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:00:00 -0500 Researchers discover how mutations disrupt protein splicing and cause disease
特定的氧化还原蛋白被确定为铁死亡的关键调节因子亥姆霍兹慕尼黑的研究人员与东北大学的同事合作，发现一种特定的氧化还原蛋白是铁死亡的关键调节剂，铁死亡是一种受调节的氧化细胞死亡的形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55f6fa50-b5b7-443c-9a79-43ac7b32c00e Fri, 15 Nov 2024 21:46:00 -0500 Specific redox protein identified as a critical regulator of ferroptosis
研究将约会应用程序的使用与大学生性传播感染的风险增加联系起来五月份，世界卫生组织对世界许多地区性传播疾病（STI）发病率上升发出了警报，目前每天新增病例超过一百万例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Study-links-dating-app-use-to-increased-risk-of-STI-among-college-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Study-links-dating-app-use-to-increased-risk-of-STI-among-college-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b49f1b25-3a15-410b-9992-fc5c1f5cd861 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 16:50:00 -0500 Study links dating app use to increased risk of STIs among college students
南加州大学凯克医院荣获 Leapfrog Group 颁发的第九个“A”医院安全等级南加州大学凯克医院获得了 Leapfrog Group 颁发的“A”医院安全等级，Leapfrog Group 是一家专注于患者安全的独立国家非营利监管机构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Keck-Hospital-of-USC-receives-ninth-A-Hospital-Safety-Grade-from-The-Leapfrog-Group.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Keck-Hospital-of-USC-receives-ninth-A-Hospital-Safety-Grade-from-The-Leapfrog-Group.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e68df45e-1ec4-454c-9dfb-ef64b845ba9a Fri, 15 Nov 2024 16:44:00 -0500 Keck Hospital of USC receives ninth "A" Hospital Safety Grade from The Leapfrog Group
杜克大学-新加坡国立大学团队开发了监测癌症治疗中工程 T 细胞的测试杜克大学和新加坡国立大学研究人员开发的一项新测试能够在重新引入癌症患者体内后实时监测经过改造以对抗癌症的 T 细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Duke-NUS-team-develops-test-to-monitor-engineered-T-cells-in-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Duke-NUS-team-develops-test-to-monitor-engineered-T-cells-in-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=687fda3f-043b-4a33-ab21-aa13a9c28cbb Fri, 15 Nov 2024 16:37:00 -0500 Duke-NUS team develops test to monitor engineered T cells in cancer treatment
乌干达严重疟疾儿童中检测到青蒿素耐药性印第安纳大学医学院的研究人员与乌干达麦克雷雷大学的同事合作，发现了对青蒿素衍生物部分耐药的证据：疟疾的主要治疗方法 -；患有严重或“复杂”疟疾的幼儿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Artemisinin-resistance-Detected-in-children-with-severe-malaria-in-Uganda.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Artemisinin-resistance-Detected-in-children-with-severe-malaria-in-Uganda.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d44cac66-39ef-4839-b0a4-eebd486151d2 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 16:30:00 -0500 Artemisinin resistance detected in children with severe malaria in Uganda
标准化筛查有助于儿科护理中更早诊断自闭症德雷塞尔大学 AJ 德雷克塞尔自闭症研究所的新研究发现，在儿科健康儿童就诊期间使用标准化自闭症筛查可以识别出更多在年轻时患有高自闭症可能性的儿童，包括那些表现出更微妙症状的儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Standardized-screening-leads-to-earlier-autism-diagnoses-in-pediatric-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Standardized-screening-leads-to-earlier-autism-diagnoses-in-pediatric-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0b13fa1-fd83-45d2-bab9-7c5cff0eeffa Fri, 15 Nov 2024 16:22:00 -0500 Standardized screening leads to earlier autism diagnoses in pediatric care
